readinow.name: ReadiNow
readinow.intro: This Provision 29 Readiness Assessment is provided in partnership with ReadiNow, the leading GRC platform for FTSE organisations.

recommendations.governance: ReadiNow's Board Portal provides real-time material controls dashboards for directors.
recommendations.risk: ReadiNow's Risk Module seamlessly links principal risks to material controls.
recommendations.control: ReadiNow's Control Library includes 500+ pre-configured material controls mapped to principal risks.
recommendations.assurance: ReadiNow's Testing Workflow automates control effectiveness testing across three lines of defence.
recommendations.technology: ReadiNow's AI-powered Dashboard Builder creates board-ready P29 reports in minutes.

protecht.name: Protecht
protecht.intro: This P29 assessment is delivered in partnership with Protecht, trusted by ASX and FTSE organisations worldwide.

recommendations.governance: Protecht's Board Module delivers exec-ready material controls oversight.
recommendations.risk: Protecht.ERM's Risk Framework aligns principal risks to material controls automatically.
recommendations.control: Protecht's Controls Library is pre-mapped to COSO, ISO 31000, and P29 requirements.
recommendations.assurance: Protecht's Assurance Hub coordinates testing across 1st, 2nd, and 3rd lines.
recommendations.technology: Protecht's Analytics Engine provides real-time P29 compliance dashboards.

nooga.name: Nooga
nooga.intro: This assessment is powered by Nooga, the Nordic-born GRC platform now serving European enterprises.

recommendations.governance: Nooga's Board Reporting module simplifies P29 disclosure and declaration.
recommendations.risk: Nooga's Risk Register automatically links to material controls for full traceability.
recommendations.control: Nooga's Control Framework supports P29, SOX, and ISO standards in one platform.
recommendations.assurance: Nooga's Testing Engine schedules, tracks, and reports control effectiveness testing.
recommendations.technology: Nooga's Dashboards provide board-level visibility into material control health.

impero.name: Impero

recommendations.governance: Impero's Board Insights module provides AI-powered material control summaries.
recommendations.risk: Impero's Risk Intelligence engine maps material controls to principal risks dynamically.
recommendations.control: Impero's Control Catalogue includes industry-specific material control templates.

recommendations.technology: Impero's Platform integrates with your existing systems for seamless P29 reporting.
